DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the validity and utility of a tele-dermatology system in the midterm periodic screening of non-widespread skin lesions of recent onset or for which a specialized early classification is deemed to change the prognosis - including precancerous skin lesions as well as melanoma and non-melanoma skin cancers - compared to control visits at fixed follow-up.
DOC.brief_title: Tele-dermatology of Skin Cancer in a Cohort of Local Health Authority Employees in the Province of Bergamo
DOC.criteria: Subjects currently working at the Local Health Authority of the province of Bergamo Subjects who are not able to use the teledermatology system or who have no access to the website or the specific app.
